lead_paragraph: With a little bit of chaos and a last-minute sprint on preparations, Rio de Janeiro was ready on Friday to revel in a moment seven years in the making: the opening of the Olympic Games.

headline.print_headline: Party Time in Rio After Rollercoaster Run-Up to the Games
headline.main: Party Time in Rio After Rollercoaster Run-Up to the Games
